key.description: the key, a unique identifier for the job

type.description: the type of the job (should match what was requested)

bpmnProcessId.description: the bpmn process ID of the job process definition

processDefinitionVersion.description: the version of the job process definition

processDefinitionKey.description: the key of the job process definition

elementInstanceKey.description:
the unique key identifying the associated task, unique within the scope of the
process instance

customHeaders.description:
a set of custom headers defined during modelling; returned as a serialized
JSON document

worker.description: the name of the worker which activated this job

retries.description: the amount of retries left to this job (should always be positive)

deadline.description: when the job can be activated again, sent as a UNIX epoch timestamp

variables.description:
JSON document, computed at activation time, consisting of all visible variables to
the task scope
